name: Break The SYSTEM (Tunta)
description:
You should preferably play it in full screen mode.

Quick, an ugly sign appeared saying "SYSTEM".  It seems to attract some dangerous creatures.

Your mission is simple:  break the SYSTEM.

To do that, you can either click one million times, or you can upgrade your slingshot through collecting magic orbs.

In case you dont know what you're doing, remember this formula: Deal damage -> Get key -> Find orb -> Repeat ; Controls:

move with A - D

jump with SPACE

Enter Pause and settings menu with ESCAPE

Mouse to aim and LMB to shoot

Unlockable skills:

Double Jump with SPACE mid-air

Stomp with S mid-air

Swim with S

Activate the big Buttons with STOMP or DOUBLE JUMP

Since people have been wondering what the two big red buttons do, the short answer would be opening a door. but since the door appears a bit later in the game, you probably won't notice it.

This is a game created in one week for the  n8Jam, and also

my first ever Game Jam!

-> a lot of bugs
